"The Weapon Palette":
"You can add a combination of weapons and photon arts/techniques
to the weapon palette to switch equipment easily.

Move palette up: <%PaletteReverse>
Move palette down: <%PaletteForce>"

"Use <%Decide> to equip a weapon
and finish switching the weapon palette."

"You can add multiple weapons to the weapon palette.
You can also add up to three photon arts/techniques."

"In the case of 3 Button mode, up to 6 Photon Arts and Techniques can be added to your weapon palette.

It allows for custom combinations with a focus on a manual play style."
